hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Juhaifa:The Prophet (ﷺ) cursed the lady who practices tattooing and the one who gets herself tattooed, and one who eats (takes) Riba' (usury) and the one who gives it. And he prohibited taking the price of a dog, and the money earned by prostitution, and cursed the makers of pictures

chapter.eng-name: The earnings of a prostitute and the illegal wedding.
